an1.98-139:4.1: “Taking into account interior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very harmful as negligence.
an1.98-139:7.1: “Taking into account interior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very beneficial as diligence.
an1.98-139:10.1: “Taking into account interior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very harmful as laziness.
an1.98-139:13.1: “Taking into account interior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very beneficial as arousing energy.
an1.98-139:16.1: “Taking into account interior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very harmful as having many wishes … having few wishes … discontent … contentment … focusing the mind in the wrong way … focusing the mind in the right way … lack of situational awareness … situational awareness …
an1.98-139:18.1: “Taking into account exterior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very harmful as bad friends.
an1.98-139:21.1: “Taking into account exterior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very beneficial as good friends.
an1.98-139:24.1: “Taking into account interior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very harmful as having bad habits and not good habits.
an1.98-139:24.2: Having bad habits and not good habits is very harmful.”
an1.98-139:27.1: “Taking into account interior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very beneficial as having good habits and not bad habits.
an1.98-139:27.2: Having good habits and not bad habits is very beneficial.”
an1.98-139:30.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that leads to the decline and disappearance of the true teaching like negligence.
an1.98-139:30.2: Negligence leads to the decline and disappearance of the true teaching.”
an1.98-139:33.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that leads to the continuation, persistence, and enduring of the true teaching like diligence.
an1.98-139:33.2: Diligence leads to the continuation, persistence, and enduring of the true teaching.”
an1.98-139:36.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that leads to the decline and disappearance of the true teaching like laziness.
an1.98-139:36.2: Laziness leads to the decline and disappearance of the true teaching.”
an1.98-139:39.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that leads to the continuation, persistence, and durability of the true teaching like arousing energy.
an1.98-139:39.2: Arousing energy leads to the continuation, persistence, and enduring of the true teaching.”
an1.98-139:42.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that leads to the decline and disappearance of the true teaching like having many wishes … having few wishes … discontent … contentment … focusing the mind in the wrong way … focusing the mind in the right way … lack of situational awareness … situational awareness … bad friends … good friends … having bad habits, not good habits.
an1.98-139:42.2: Having bad habits and not good habits leads to the decline and disappearance of the true teaching.”
an1.98-139:45.1: “Mendicants, I do not see a single thing that leads to the continuation, persistence, and enduring of the true teaching like having good habits and not bad habits.
an1.98-139:45.2: Having good habits and not bad habits leads to the continuation, persistence, and enduring of the true teaching”
an1.98-139:49.1: “Mendicants, those mendicants who explain non-Dharma as Dharma are acting for the hurt and unhappiness of many people, for the harm, hurt, and suffering of gods and humans.
an1.98-139:49.2: They make much bad karma and make the true teaching disappear.”
an1.98-139:52.1: “Mendicants, those mendicants who explain Dharma as non-Dharma are acting for the hurt and unhappiness of many people, for the harm, hurt, and suffering of gods and humans.
an1.98-139:52.2: They make much bad karma and make the true teaching disappear.”
an1.98-139:55.1: “Those mendicants who explain non-Vinaya as Vinaya … Vinaya as non-Vinaya … what was not spoken and stated by the Realized One as spoken and stated by the Realized One …  what was spoken and stated by the Realized One as not spoken and stated by the Realized One …  what was not practiced by the Realized One as practiced by the Realized One …  what was practiced by the Realized One as not practiced by the Realized One …  what was not prescribed by the Realized One as prescribed by the Realized One … what was prescribed by the Realized One as not prescribed by the Realized One …
an1.98-139:55.2: are acting for the hurt and unhappiness of many people, for the harm, hurt, and suffering of gods and humans.
an1.98-139:55.3: They make much bad karma and make the true teaching disappear.”
